Home.Experience: I am in my 3A term studying computer engineering at University of Waterloo. I have experience developing dynamic single-page applications using Angular, Vue, and .NET Core. I previously worked at Paralucent, MCAP, and Gore Mutual Insurance in software and web development roles.
